text: This list is of the Cultural Properties of Japan designated in the category of for the Prefecture of Ehime. ==National Cultural Properties== As of 1 July 2015, forty-eight Important Cultural Properties (including three *National Treasures) with one hundred and nineteen component structures have been designated, being of national significance. {| class="wikitable sortable" align="center"|Shōbō-ji Kannondō Shōbōji Kannondō || || Uwajima || || || || |- |} ==Municipal Cultural Properties== As of 1 May 2014, two hundred and forty-one properties have been designated at a municipal level. ==Registered Cultural Properties== As of 1 July 2015, one hundred and ten properties have been registered (as opposed to designated) at a national level. ==See also== * Cultural Properties of Japan * National Treasures of Japan * List of Historic Sites of Japan (Ehime) * List of Cultural Properties of Japan - paintings (Ehime) * List of Cultural Properties of Japan -
